channel.title: [PI]Rank prolem! please help!
channel.description:
Hello everyone,
I got a problem with mine ranks. When I give my self right 3 its says im an admin. And when i give rank 2 is also admin. And rank 4 is owner.... Please help me to change the rank 3 to owner. please

item.title: [PI]Rank prolem! please help!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

dude stupid frickin holy just sent me 3 more messages asking for help, have about 8 now. and he requested my help, again in someone elses topic (help!!!) on here.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Rank prolem! please help!
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:12, topic:383185”][quote author=Rash link=topic=478962.msg3506730#msg3506730 date=1298204462]

Its just yell.

4 is hidden owner.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; if(c.playerRights == 0) { c.testMessage(); } else if (c.playerRights == 1) { c2.sendMessage("<col=990>[Moderator] " + c.playerName + ":<col=1> " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))); } else if (c.playerRights == 2) { c2.sendMessage("<col=990>[Head Mod] " + c.playerName + ":<col=1> " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))); } else if (c.playerRights == 3) { c2.sendMessage("<col=990>[Owner] " + c.playerName + ":<col=1> " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))); } else if (c.playerRights == 4) { c2.sendMessage("<col=990>[Premium Member] <col=1>" + c.playerName + ": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))); } else if (c.playerRights == 5) { c.sendMessage("You can't yell as a hidden donator!"); } } } }

You don’t know it but you just solved your own question. copy the command for rights 3 (head mod) and paste it over rights 4 (owner). then change the text “Head Mod” to Owner, or what ever you would like. then compile and so forth

You said it was my question?
It wasnt my problem, genius
[/quote]
i was just saying what he should do, because if 4 is hidden on his, then make it public, genius.[/quote]

Read full topic

You don’t know it but you just solved your own question. copy the command for rights 3 (head mod) and paste it over rights 4 (owner). then change the text “Head Mod” to Owner, or what ever you would like. then compile and so forth

[/quote]

gangsta57:

not only yell. It’s just like right 0 is normal 1 is mod 2 is admin 3 is also admin and 4 is owner. I wanna change that right 3 from admin to owner.

Like i said before, don’t worry about it. although it seems weird, its set like that for a reason. 2 is admin because thats normal admin, 3 is admin because thats head-admin
